main.*: Subscribe to the mediawiki-api-announce mailing list at <https://lists.wikimedia.org/postorius/lists/mediawiki-api-announce.lists.wikimedia.org/> for notice of API deprecations and breaking changes.

revisions.*: Because "rvslots" was not specified, a legacy format has been used for the output. This format is deprecated, and in the future the new format will always be used.

[[File:PoisoningFlag.gif|thumb]] __TOC__ ==Description== [[Poisoning]] applies to [[Magery]], Warriors, [[Alchemy]] and some [[Blacksmithing]]. [[Poisoning]] allows a player to apply Poison potions to a weapon or food making it more deadly. There are different levels of poison that can be applied, causing the amount of Cure [[Potions]] or [[cure]] attempts from Magery Spells fail. ==Usage== :Apply poison to a Blade or War fork :Apply poison to food which will poison the target when eaten : :At GM Poisoning: ::The Poison spell has the ability to cast Greater Poison within 10 tiles of the target and a 10% chance to cast Deadly Poison within 3 tiles of target ::A Poisoned weapon has a 40% chance to inflict poison on a target (up from 20% with no poisoning) ==Weapons== You may apply poison to the following weapons '''Fencing''' :Dagger :Kryss :Warfork '''Swords''' :Broad Sword :Cutlass :Katana :Longsword :Long Sword (thin) :Scimitar :Viking Sword :Skinning Knife :Cleaver :Butcher Knife ==Types of Poison== {| cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" border="1" width="100%" ! style="background-color:#000; color:#FFFFFF;" | Type ! style="background-color:#000; color:#FFFFFF;" | Effects ! style="background-color:#000; color:#FFFFFF;" | Message When
Affected ! style="background-color:#000; color:#FFFFFF;" | Message When Other
Is Affected ! style="background-color:#000; color:#FFFFFF;" | Duration |- align="center" |Lesser |~4-7% current HP per 2 seconds. |*You feel a bit nauseous* |*''Target'' looks ill.* |30 seconds. |- align="center" |Standard |~5-10% maximum HP per 3 seconds. |* You feel disorientated and nauseous! * |* ''Target'' looks extremely ill. * |30 seconds. |- align="center" |Greater |~7-15% maximum HP per 4 seconds. |* You begin to feel pain throughout your body! * |* ''Target'' stumbles around in confusion and pain. * |40 seconds. |- align="center" |Deadly |~15-30% maximum HP per 5 seconds. |* You feel extremely weak and are in severe pain! * |* ''Target'' is wracked with extreme pain. * |1 minute. |- align="center" |Lethal |~16-33% maximum HP per 5 seconds. |* You are in extreme pain, and require immediate aid! * |* ''Target'' begins to spasm uncontrollably. * |1 minute 20 seconds. |} == Recommended Leveling == Repeatedly poison the same weapon/item. :0 - 30: Train at an NPC [[Thieves Guild]] Guildmaster. :30 - 40: Apply Lesser Poison :40 - 70: Apply Poison :70 - 92: Apply Greater Poison :92 - 100: Apply Deadly Poison ==See Also== *[[Alchemy]] *[[Swordsmanship]] *[[Fencing]] [[Category:Skills]]
